articles.author: Mari Eccles
articles.title: Massive barrage of missiles, drones hits Kyiv and western Ukraine - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: One Russian cruise missile violated Polish airspace.
articles.content: For the third pre-dawn morning this week, all of Ukraine is under an air alert and has been advised to seek shelter, U.S. Ambassador Bridget Brink wrote on X early Sunday. Russia continues to indiscr… [+834 chars]
